events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday evening involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail.
After review, the claim was classified under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer's car in a collision.
An insurance agent was promptly assigned to the case to assist the claimant with the vehicle accident claim process.
The insurer acknowledged receipt of the claim and confirmed the initial details regarding the vehicle collision.
The insurance company requested the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed further.
Customer submitted all required documents including the accident report, multiple photos of the damaged car, and a repair quote.
The claims team initiated a thorough investigation to verify the circumstances of the accident and assess the damage.
The investigation confirmed the details of the auto accident, validating the claim for vehicle damages caused by the collision.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and deductible was proposed to the claimant for the damaged vehicle.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the professionalism of the claims team.
The claim was officially approved based on investigation results and customer agreement to the proposed settlement.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount was disbursed to the customerâ€™s bank account within the expected timeframe.
The claim has been closed following successful payment issuance and confirmation from the customer about the resolution.
The entire claim file was securely archived for record-keeping and future reference in accordance with company policies.
